text.__SUMMARY__:
Millettia orientalis is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found only in Madagascar.
text.References: Du Puy, D. & Labat, H. (1998). "Millettia orientalis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T36235A9990242. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T36235A9990242.en. Retrieved 21 December 2017.
